sense.name: cancel officially; rescind
sense.examples: The Department of Homeland Security revoked his work visa. They revoked my access card to the server room. They distorted the story further by saying 'Darwin also revoked his own Evolutionism theory.'

sense.name: CARDS: fail to follow suit when able and required to do so
sense.examples: What happens if the player who revoked won the trick on which he revoked?
